column3:
Uh. Yes. That makes much more sense.
Thanks for fixing.

utACK 7ba55396a0b9e013bd08db0678eb917af5b1f0b2

If anyone wants to add a tested ack, easiest way to test this is to start bitcoin-qt with `-walletrbf` flag, and make sure "Request Replace-By-Fee" checkbox is checked, then start without the `-walletrbf` flag and make sure the checkbox is unchecked.\n\nYou can find the "Request Replace-By-Fee" checkbox under "Send", "Transaction Fee", "Choose..."
